text: @chrislhayes Trump has proven himself to be a clear and present danger to the health and well being of all Americans during the coronavirus health care crisis!  He is truly dangerous!  Do NOT listen to this charlatan regarding health matters on coronavirus! Trump’s ideas could kill you!
